title: Inaugural ST Taiwan Tech Day Highlights Mobility, Power, Connectivity, and Sensing Trends - Eetasia.com
summary: STMicroelectronics held its first-ever ST Taiwan Tech Day showcasing innovations in Smart Mobility, Power & Energy, IoT & Connectivity, and Sensing. The event highlighted products like the Zonal Gateway for automotive systems, 3rd-Generation SiC Modules for electric vehicles, and Edge AI Washing Machine Solution for energy efficiency.

title: How to be Eco-Friendly - The Independent
summary: The article discusses eco-friendly home improvements to reduce environmental impact, focusing on energy-efficient lighting, smart thermostats, natural materials, low-carbon heating systems, insulation, renewable energy sources, energy-efficient appliances, water conservation, waste reduction, and recycling.
green_innovation: TRUE, The article promotes eco-friendly home improvements and sustainable practices that contribute to environmental sustainability goals by reducing energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions.
business_innovation: FALSE, The article focuses on home improvements and sustainable practices rather than new or improved products or business processes introduced to the market by a firm.
green_product: TRUE, The article suggests using eco-friendly materials and products like energy-efficient lighting, natural toxin-free materials, and low-VOC paint to reduce environmental impact throughout the product lifecycle.
green_process: TRUE, The article recommends green processes such as heat pumps, underfloor heating, insulation, weatherproofing, renewable energy sources, energy-efficient appliances, water conservation, waste reduction, and recycling to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 236220 (Commercial and Institutional Building Construction), 238220 (Plumbing, Heating, and Air-Conditioning Contractors), 561210 (Facilities Support Services), 541330 (Engineering Services)
greenwashing: FALSE, The article provides genuine recommendations and information on how to make eco-friendly home improvements without engaging in deceptive environmental marketing.
